content.question: Shown is a slope field for which of the following differential equations?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect of x, equals, the absolute value of, x plus y, end absolute value" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, x cubed" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, y cubed" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, y squared" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, y squared" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

topic.text: 6.5: Interpreting the Behavior of Accumulation Functions Involving Area

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
